title: Employment Equality and Preservation of Certain Records Act 2024 (No. 37 of
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Maternity Protection, Employment
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Maternity Protection, Employment 
Equality and Preservation of Certain Records Act 2024 (Section 6) 
(Commencement) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited maternity protection employment equality preservation certain record act 2024 (section 6) (commencement) order 2024

title: Employment Equality and Preservation of Certain Records Act 2024 (No. 37 of
heading: 2. The 20th day of November 2024 is appointed as the day on which section
text_raw:
2. The 20th day of November 2024 is appointed as the day on which section 
6 of the Maternity Protection, Employment Equality and Preservation of Certain 
Records Act 2024 (No. 37 of 2024) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

20 November, 2024. 

HEATHER HUMPHREYS, 

Minister for Social Protection. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 22nd November, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [640] 3

title: Employment Equality and Preservation of Certain Records Act 2024 (No. 37 of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This order provides for the commencement of section 6 of the Maternity 
Protection, Employment Equality and Preservation of Certain Records Act 2024 
(No. 37 of 2024) from 20 November 2024. That section amends section 47 of 
the Social Welfare Consolidation Act 2005 to enable the Minister for Social 
Protection to make Regulations to allow for the postponement of the payment of 
maternity benefit in the event of the person who is entitled to that benefit having 
a serious health condition within the meaning of section 14C of the Maternity 
Protection Act 1994. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [640]
